stimulusHtml: An increase in a governmentâ€™s deficit spending will most likely affect a nation in an open economy in which of the following ways?
choicesHtml: The economy will experience financial capital outflows, and its currency will appreciate.
The economy will experience financial capital outflows, and its currency will depreciate.
The economy will experience financial capital inflows, and its currency will appreciate.
The economy will experience financial capital inflows, and its currency will depreciate.
The economy will experience no change in financial capital flows, and the value of its currency will not change.
